Text:
i can't believe it ... after months of research to get a whatever-like copy of this album (i have been offered scratched flea-market discs for about 120,- euros !!) here it is.
where did you find it, 80z? you really made my day (again)
I really like that cover! I miss the days of interesting and in some cases downright brilliant album art work. Thanks!
Just got done listening to this. I really liked it. Thanks to kastlebay for requesting this and thanks to 80zforever fo completing the request.

I only know 2 tracks. 
Time to discover the whole album (never too late).

Thanks

Oh man, this brings back memories. I have the vinyl, but not as mp3:s - it's all recorded on Maxell 90 minute cassettes. Yup, I'm old...

Thanks man!

TX, TX, and TX again!
This is my past, my young age, my history....
